description: Length of period of continued fraction for sqrt(m), m = n-th nonsquare.
links: Vincenzo Librandi and Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (first 1000 terms from Vincenzo Librandi)
Kival Ngaokrajang, Illustration of initial terms, periodic are colored
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Continued Fraction.
mathematica: nonSquares = Select[Range[120], !IntegerQ[Sqrt[#]]&]; a[n_] := Length[ Last[ ContinuedFraction[ Sqrt[ nonSquares[[n]] ]]]]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, Length[nonSquares]}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, May 27 2013 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
